isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW HINGE

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Vent Window Hinge on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door vent window hinge (Item 2) on the cab door vent window frame (Item 3) by installing both cab door vent window hinge locating pins (Item 7) on the cab door vent window hinge into holes in cab door vent window frame. Install two torx head screws (Item 1), driver side shown. Tighten to 53 to 70.5 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).

Install front cab door vent window, refer to
CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW
.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door vent window hinge.
